issue.title: [Java][Docs] Document JDBC module
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17003](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17003). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The arrow-jdbc submodule could use its own documentation page.

In particular, we should document the type mapping it uses (and the rationale where applicable) and how to customize it.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17003?focusedCommentId=17566290) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13543
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13543>
